name: Open Source for Good
message: Once you feel ready, you can get real-world experience by contributing to these open source tools used by nonprofits.

challenges.title: Mail for Good
description: Mail for Good is an open source email campaign management tool for nonprofits.

challenges.title: Pantry for Good
description: Pantry for Good is an open source food bank logistics and inventory management tool.

challenges.title: Meeting for Good
description: Meeting for Good is an open source meeting coordination app for nonprofit teams.

challenges.title: League for Good
description: League for Good is an open source sports league management tool.

challenges.title: Conference for Good
description: Conference for Good is an open source conference management tool.

challenges.title: The freeCodeCamp Core Platform
description: The freeCodeCamp core platform is the learning resource you are using right now at this exact moment ;)

challenges.title: The freeCodeCamp Guide
description: The freeCodeCamp Guide is a collection of easy-to-understand guides to programming tools.
